00035 B3_FORCE_INLINE int b3StrLen(const char* str) 
00036 {
00037     if (!str) 
00038                 return(0);
00039         int len = 0;
00040     
00041         while (*str != 0)
00042         {
00043         str++;
00044         len++;
00045     }
00046 
00047     return len;
00048 }

00106 #define B3_HEADER_LENGTH 12
00107 #if defined(__sgi) || defined (__sparc) || defined (__sparc__) || defined (__PPC__) || defined (__ppc__) || defined (__BIG_ENDIAN__)
00108 #       define B3_MAKE_ID(a,b,c,d) ( (int)(a)<<24 | (int)(b)<<16 | (c)<<8 | (d) )
00109 #else
00110 #       define B3_MAKE_ID(a,b,c,d) ( (int)(d)<<24 | (int)(c)<<16 | (b)<<8 | (a) )
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 #define B3_SOFTBODY_CODE                B3_MAKE_ID('S','B','D','Y')
00114 #define B3_COLLISIONOBJECT_CODE B3_MAKE_ID('C','O','B','J')
00115 #define B3_RIGIDBODY_CODE               B3_MAKE_ID('R','B','D','Y')
00116 #define B3_CONSTRAINT_CODE              B3_MAKE_ID('C','O','N','S')
00117 #define B3_BOXSHAPE_CODE                B3_MAKE_ID('B','O','X','S')
00118 #define B3_QUANTIZED_BVH_CODE   B3_MAKE_ID('Q','B','V','H')
00119 #define B3_TRIANLGE_INFO_MAP    B3_MAKE_ID('T','M','A','P')
00120 #define B3_SHAPE_CODE                   B3_MAKE_ID('S','H','A','P')
00121 #define B3_ARRAY_CODE                   B3_MAKE_ID('A','R','A','Y')
00122 #define B3_SBMATERIAL_CODE              B3_MAKE_ID('S','B','M','T')
00123 #define B3_SBNODE_CODE                  B3_MAKE_ID('S','B','N','D')
00124 #define B3_DYNAMICSWORLD_CODE   B3_MAKE_ID('D','W','L','D')
00125 #define B3_DNA_CODE                             B3_MAKE_ID('D','N','A','1')

00128 struct  b3PointerUid
00129 {
00130         union
00131         {
00132                 void*   m_ptr;
00133                 int             m_uniqueIds[2];
00134         };
00135 };

00145         b3AlignedObjectArray<short>                     mTlens;
00146         b3HashMap<b3HashInt, int>                       mStructReverse;
00147         b3HashMap<b3HashString,int>     mTypeLookup;
00148 
00149         
00150         b3HashMap<b3HashPtr,void*>      m_chunkP;
00151         
00152         b3HashMap<b3HashPtr,const char*>        m_nameMap;
00153 
00154         b3HashMap<b3HashPtr,b3PointerUid>       m_uniquePointers;
00155         int     m_uniqueIdGenerator;

00170         virtual void*   findPointer(void* oldPtr) 
00171         {
00172                 void** ptr = m_chunkP.find(oldPtr);
00173                 if (ptr && *ptr)
00174                         return *ptr;
00175                 return 0;
00176         }

00182                 void    writeDNA()
00183                 {
00184                         b3Chunk* dnaChunk = allocate(m_dnaLength,1);
00185                         memcpy(dnaChunk->m_oldPtr,m_dna,m_dnaLength);
00186                         finalizeChunk(dnaChunk,"DNA1",B3_DNA_CODE, m_dna);
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 int getReverseType(const char *type) const
00190                 {
00191 
00192                         b3HashString key(type);
00193                         const int* valuePtr = mTypeLookup.find(key);
00194                         if (valuePtr)
00195                                 return *valuePtr;
00196                         
00197                         return -1;
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 void initDNA(const char* bdnaOrg,int dnalen)
00201                 {
00203                         if (m_dna)
00204                                 return;
00205 
00206                         int littleEndian= 1;
00207                         littleEndian= ((char*)&littleEndian)[0];
00208                         
00209 
00210                         m_dna = b3AlignedAlloc(dnalen,16);
00211                         memcpy(m_dna,bdnaOrg,dnalen);
00212                         m_dnaLength = dnalen;
00213 
00214                         int *intPtr=0;
00215                         short *shtPtr=0;
00216                         char *cp = 0;int dataLen =0;
00217                         intPtr = (int*)m_dna;
00218 
00219                         /*
00220                                 SDNA (4 bytes) (magic number)
00221                                 NAME (4 bytes)
00222                                 <nr> (4 bytes) amount of names (int)
00223                                 <string>
00224                                 <string>
00225                         */
00226 
00227                         if (strncmp((const char*)m_dna, "SDNA", 4)==0)
00228                         {
00229                                 // skip ++ NAME
00230                                 intPtr++; intPtr++;
00231                         }
00232 
00233                         // Parse names
00234                         if (!littleEndian)
00235                                 *intPtr = b3SwapEndian(*intPtr);
00236                                 
00237                         dataLen = *intPtr;
00238                         
00239                         intPtr++;
00240 
00241                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00242                         int i;
00243                         for ( i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00244                         {
00245                                 
00246                                 while (*cp)cp++;
00247                                 cp++;
00248                         }
00249                         cp = b3AlignPointer(cp,4);
00250 
00251                         /*
00252                                 TYPE (4 bytes)
00253                                 <nr> amount of types (int)
00254                                 <string>
00255                                 <string>
00256                         */
00257 
00258                         intPtr = (int*)cp;
00259                         b3Assert(strncmp(cp, "TYPE", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00260 
00261                         if (!littleEndian)
00262                                 *intPtr =  b3SwapEndian(*intPtr);
00263                         
00264                         dataLen = *intPtr;
00265                         intPtr++;
00266 
00267                         
00268                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00269                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00270                         {
00271                                 mTypes.push_back(cp);
00272                                 while (*cp)cp++;
00273                                 cp++;
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         cp = b3AlignPointer(cp,4);
00277 
00278 
00279                         /*
00280                                 TLEN (4 bytes)
00281                                 <len> (short) the lengths of types
00282                                 <len>
00283                         */
00284 
00285                         // Parse type lens
00286                         intPtr = (int*)cp;
00287                         b3Assert(strncmp(cp, "TLEN", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00288 
00289                         dataLen = (int)mTypes.size();
00290 
00291                         shtPtr = (short*)intPtr;
00292                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++, shtPtr++)
00293                         {
00294                                 if (!littleEndian)
00295                                         shtPtr[0] = b3SwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00296                                 mTlens.push_back(shtPtr[0]);
00297                         }
00298 
00299                         if (dataLen & 1) shtPtr++;
00300 
00301                         /*
00302                                 STRC (4 bytes)
00303                                 <nr> amount of structs (int)
00304                                 <typenr>
00305                                 <nr_of_elems>
00306                                 <typenr>
00307                                 <namenr>
00308                                 <typenr>
00309                                 <namenr>
00310                         */
00311 
00312                         intPtr = (int*)shtPtr;
00313                         cp = (char*)intPtr;
00314                         b3Assert(strncmp(cp, "STRC", 4)==0); intPtr++;
00315 
00316                         if (!littleEndian)
00317                                 *intPtr = b3SwapEndian(*intPtr);
00318                         dataLen = *intPtr ; 
00319                         intPtr++;
00320 
00321 
00322                         shtPtr = (short*)intPtr;
00323                         for (i=0; i<dataLen; i++)
00324                         {
00325                                 mStructs.push_back (shtPtr);
00326                                 
00327                                 if (!littleEndian)
00328                                 {
00329                                         shtPtr[0]= b3SwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00330                                         shtPtr[1]= b3SwapEndian(shtPtr[1]);
00331 
00332                                         int len = shtPtr[1];
00333                                         shtPtr+= 2;
00334 
00335                                         for (int a=0; a<len; a++, shtPtr+=2)
00336                                         {
00337                                                         shtPtr[0]= b3SwapEndian(shtPtr[0]);
00338                                                         shtPtr[1]= b3SwapEndian(shtPtr[1]);
00339                                         }
00340 
00341                                 } else
00342                                 {
00343                                         shtPtr+= (2*shtPtr[1])+2;
00344                                 }
00345                         }
00346 
00347                         // build reverse lookups
00348                         for (i=0; i<(int)mStructs.size(); i++)
00349                         {
00350                                 short *strc = mStructs.at(i);
00351                                 mStructReverse.insert(strc[0], i);
00352                                 mTypeLookup.insert(b3HashString(mTypes[strc[0]]),i);
00353                         }
00354                 }

00361                 b3DefaultSerializer(int totalSize=0)
00362                         :m_totalSize(totalSize),
00363                         m_currentSize(0),
00364                         m_dna(0),
00365                         m_dnaLength(0),
00366                         m_serializationFlags(0)
00367                 {
00368                         m_buffer = m_totalSize?(unsigned char*)b3AlignedAlloc(totalSize,16):0;
00369                         
00370                         const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*)==8));
00371 
00372 #ifdef B3_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00373                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00374                         {
00375 #if _WIN64
00376                                 initDNA((const char*)b3s_bulletDNAstr64,b3s_bulletDNAlen64);
00377 #else
00378                                 b3Assert(0);
00379 #endif
00380                         } else
00381                         {
00382 #ifndef _WIN64
00383                                 initDNA((const char*)b3s_bulletDNAstr,b3s_bulletDNAlen);
00384 #else
00385                                 b3Assert(0);
00386 #endif
00387                         }
00388         
00389 #else //B3_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00390                         if (VOID_IS_8)
00391                         {
00392                                 initDNA((const char*)b3s_bulletDNAstr64,b3s_bulletDNAlen64);
00393                         } else
00394                         {
00395                                 initDNA((const char*)b3s_bulletDNAstr,b3s_bulletDNAlen);
00396                         }
00397 #endif //B3_INTERNAL_UPDATE_SERIALIZATION_STRUCTURES
00398         
00399                 }
00400 
00401                 virtual ~b3DefaultSerializer() 
00402                 {
00403                         if (m_buffer)
00404                                 b3AlignedFree(m_buffer);
00405                         if (m_dna)
00406                                 b3AlignedFree(m_dna);
00407                 }
00408 
00409                 void    writeHeader(unsigned char* buffer) const
00410                 {
00411                         
00412 
00413 #ifdef  B3_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00414                         memcpy(buffer, "BULLETd", 7);
00415 #else
00416                         memcpy(buffer, "BULLETf", 7);
00417 #endif //B3_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION
00418         
00419                         int littleEndian= 1;
00420                         littleEndian= ((char*)&littleEndian)[0];
00421 
00422                         if (sizeof(void*)==8)
00423                         {
00424                                 buffer[7] = '-';
00425                         } else
00426                         {
00427                                 buffer[7] = '_';
00428                         }
00429 
00430                         if (littleEndian)
00431                         {
00432                                 buffer[8]='v';                          
00433                         } else
00434                         {
00435                                 buffer[8]='V';
00436                         }
00437 
00438 
00439                         buffer[9] = '2';
00440                         buffer[10] = '8';
00441                         buffer[11] = '1';
00442 
00443                 }
00444 
00445                 virtual void    startSerialization()
00446                 {
00447                         m_uniqueIdGenerator= 1;
00448                         if (m_totalSize)
00449                         {
00450                                 unsigned char* buffer = internalAlloc(B3_HEADER_LENGTH);
00451                                 writeHeader(buffer);
00452                         }
00453                         
00454                 }
00455 
00456                 virtual void    finishSerialization()
00457                 {
00458                         writeDNA();
00459 
00460                         //if we didn't pre-allocate a buffer, we need to create a contiguous buffer now
00461                         int mysize = 0;
00462                         if (!m_totalSize)
00463                         {
00464                                 if (m_buffer)
00465                                         b3AlignedFree(m_buffer);
00466 
00467                                 m_currentSize += B3_HEADER_LENGTH;
00468                                 m_buffer = (unsigned char*)b3AlignedAlloc(m_currentSize,16);
00469 
00470                                 unsigned char* currentPtr = m_buffer;
00471                                 writeHeader(m_buffer);
00472                                 currentPtr += B3_HEADER_LENGTH;
00473                                 mysize+=B3_HEADER_LENGTH;
00474                                 for (int i=0;i< m_chunkPtrs.size();i++)
00475                                 {
00476                                         int curLength = sizeof(b3Chunk)+m_chunkPtrs[i]->m_length;
00477                                         memcpy(currentPtr,m_chunkPtrs[i], curLength);
00478                                         b3AlignedFree(m_chunkPtrs[i]);
00479                                         currentPtr+=curLength;
00480                                         mysize+=curLength;
00481                                 }
00482                         }
00483 
00484                         mTypes.clear();
00485                         mStructs.clear();
00486                         mTlens.clear();
00487                         mStructReverse.clear();
00488                         mTypeLookup.clear();
00489                         m_chunkP.clear();
00490                         m_nameMap.clear();
00491                         m_uniquePointers.clear();
00492                         m_chunkPtrs.clear();
00493                 }
00494 
00495                 virtual void*   getUniquePointer(void*oldPtr)
00496                 {
00497                         if (!oldPtr)
00498                                 return 0;
00499 
00500                         b3PointerUid* uptr = (b3PointerUid*)m_uniquePointers.find(oldPtr);
00501                         if (uptr)
00502                         {
00503                                 return uptr->m_ptr;
00504                         }
00505                         m_uniqueIdGenerator++;
00506                         
00507                         b3PointerUid uid;
00508                         uid.m_uniqueIds[0] = m_uniqueIdGenerator;
00509                         uid.m_uniqueIds[1] = m_uniqueIdGenerator;
00510                         m_uniquePointers.insert(oldPtr,uid);
00511                         return uid.m_ptr;
00512 
00513                 }
00514 
00515                 virtual const unsigned char*            getBufferPointer() const
00516                 {
00517                         return m_buffer;
00518                 }
00519 
00520                 virtual int                                     getCurrentBufferSize() const
00521                 {
00522                         return  m_currentSize;
00523                 }
00524 
00525                 virtual void    finalizeChunk(b3Chunk* chunk, const char* structType, int chunkCode,void* oldPtr)
00526                 {
00527                         if (!(m_serializationFlags&B3_SERIALIZE_NO_DUPLICATE_ASSERT))
00528                         {
00529                                 b3Assert(!findPointer(oldPtr));
00530                         }
00531 
00532                         chunk->m_dna_nr = getReverseType(structType);
00533                         
00534                         chunk->m_chunkCode = chunkCode;
00535                         
00536                         void* uniquePtr = getUniquePointer(oldPtr);
00537                         
00538                         m_chunkP.insert(oldPtr,uniquePtr);//chunk->m_oldPtr);
00539                         chunk->m_oldPtr = uniquePtr;//oldPtr;
00540                         
00541                 }
00542 
00543                 
00544                 virtual unsigned char* internalAlloc(size_t size)
00545                 {
00546                         unsigned char* ptr = 0;
00547 
00548                         if (m_totalSize)
00549                         {
00550                                 ptr = m_buffer+m_currentSize;
00551                                 m_currentSize += int(size);
00552                                 b3Assert(m_currentSize<m_totalSize);
00553                         } else
00554                         {
00555                                 ptr = (unsigned char*)b3AlignedAlloc(size,16);
00556                                 m_currentSize += int(size);
00557                         }
00558                         return ptr;
00559                 }
00560 
00561                 
00562 
00563                 virtual b3Chunk*        allocate(size_t size, int numElements)
00564                 {
00565 
00566                         unsigned char* ptr = internalAlloc(int(size)*numElements+sizeof(b3Chunk));
00567 
00568                         unsigned char* data = ptr + sizeof(b3Chunk);
00569                         
00570                         b3Chunk* chunk = (b3Chunk*)ptr;
00571                         chunk->m_chunkCode = 0;
00572                         chunk->m_oldPtr = data;
00573                         chunk->m_length = int(size)*numElements;
00574                         chunk->m_number = numElements;
00575                         
00576                         m_chunkPtrs.push_back(chunk);
00577                         
00578 
00579                         return chunk;
00580                 }
00581 
00582                 virtual const char*     findNameForPointer(const void* ptr) const
00583                 {
00584                         const char*const * namePtr = m_nameMap.find(ptr);
00585                         if (namePtr && *namePtr)
00586                                 return *namePtr;
00587                         return 0;
00588 
00589                 }
00590 
00591                 virtual void    registerNameForPointer(const void* ptr, const char* name)
00592                 {
00593                         m_nameMap.insert(ptr,name);
00594                 }
00595 
00596                 virtual void    serializeName(const char* name)
00597                 {
00598                         if (name)
00599                         {
00600                                 //don't serialize name twice
00601                                 if (findPointer((void*)name))
00602                                         return;
00603 
00604                                 int len = b3StrLen(name);
00605                                 if (len)
00606                                 {
00607 
00608                                         int newLen = len+1;
00609                                         int padding = ((newLen+3)&~3)-newLen;
00610                                         newLen += padding;
00611 
00612                                         //serialize name string now
00613                                         b3Chunk* chunk = allocate(sizeof(char),newLen);
00614                                         char* destinationName = (char*)chunk->m_oldPtr;
00615                                         for (int i=0;i<len;i++)
00616                                         {
00617                                                 destinationName[i] = name[i];
00618                                         }
00619                                         destinationName[len] = 0;
00620                                         finalizeChunk(chunk,"char",B3_ARRAY_CODE,(void*)name);
00621                                 }
00622                         }
00623                 }
00624 
00625                 virtual int             getSerializationFlags() const
00626                 {
00627                         return m_serializationFlags;
00628                 }
00629 
00630                 virtual void    setSerializationFlags(int flags)
00631                 {
00632                         m_serializationFlags = flags;
00633                 }
